title: Candlelight in Algeria 1943 (Mystery, War film) James Mason, Carla Lehmann, Raymond Lovell

sources.title: Candlelight in Algeria 1943 (Mystery, War film) James Mason, Carla Lehmann, Raymond Lovell
sources.description:
Where Love Meets Espionage in the Heat of Battle.
An American sculptress in wartime Algiers gets mixed up with a British agent and a Nazi spy who knows that a top-secret meeting of Allied military leaders will be taking place in Algeria - and that the British agent has a camera that has photographs of the meeting place.

Original title: Candlelight in Algeria (1944)
Subtitles are available.


Black & White version: https://youtu.be/_Jxsig6eHi0

Director: George King
Producers: George King, John Stafford
Writers: Brock Williams, Katherine Strueby, Dorothy Hope, John Clements
Stars: James Mason, Carla Lehmann, Raymond Lovell
Genres: Classics, Colorized, Drama, History, War


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles).
01:10 Introduction.
06;06 During WWII, Susan Foster finds herself embroiled into espionage in North Africa, leading to a mysterious adventure.
14:28 Intrigue unfolds in wartime Algeria, involving a mysterious map, a hidden camera, and a risky mission.
24:02 Susan gets involved in a dangerous mission during wartime in Algeria.
30:26 A mysterious encounter unfolds, involving love, deception, and unexpected twists.
36:57 Intrigue and loyalty unfold as a woman faces suspicion and danger during wartime in Algeria.
44:13 Mystery unfolds as characters navigate deception and danger.
58:00 Danger surrounds a group planning a secret meeting near Hazard promontory in North Africa & a dangerous negotiation.
1:06:13 Navigating through suspicious activities and unexpected encounters during wartime.
1:14:51 Intrigue and action unfold during World War II in Algeria, involving German officers, American uniforms, and a daring escape.
